name: ShooterController.cs - one class shooter
description:
Created for The 1 Class Jam.

Game made with one class created with Unity. Graphics and sounds are created in unity with default unity tools. 

Only asset from outside: Font (for obvious reasons)

2 types of enemies. Feel free to expand it if you want.

Controlls: arrows or WSAD + mouse

sorry for poor optimalisation (i know its bad). I made this only to refresh my mind from my daily job project
